Text:
Many thanks again for your kindness - it is much appreciated by us all!

For those wondering why it is bigger than usual, this is the annual F1 2012 Season Guide issue, 140 pages. And, as always with @raymond_u, this is a True PDF with searchable text.
Cheers for the kind words Thor. I hadn't even realized it was bigger - I just sort of uploaded it like I was just on autopilot.
